Mere

Daily journal app and Congressional App Challenge winner.

> Go to website > View on Github

Mere was created in fall of 2017 for the Congressional App Challenge. Watch the winning video:

My grandma was an inspiration in making this app. When I was younger, she used to call me after school and ask me what was the best, worst, and funniest part of my day.

I turned this question into a journal app.

​”Highly innovative and will help users daily as they document their thoughts and emotions.” - Rep. Anna G. Eshoo, CA-18
